forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 47. West northwest wind around 7 mph.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 58, with temperatures falling to around 56 in the afternoon. West northwest wind 3 to 10 mph.

weather_report:
The dawn breaks over San Francisco, revealing a tapestry of mostly clear skies with a gentle hint of the lingering chill from overnight. The low temperature of 47 adds an invigorating edge to the morning air, kissed lightly by a west-northwest breeze, whispering through the streets at a modest 7 mph. As the sun ascends, it bathes the city in soft, golden hues, crafting a day that promises to be predominantly sunny. Highs will reach near 58, with temperatures gently easing back to around 56 as the afternoon unfolds.

While the forecast hints at the absence of fog, the coastal embrace leaves a subtle marine layer lurking in the shadows of the Golden Gate. The clarity of the day suggests a pleasant outing is well within reach. To best enjoy this transitional weather, layering would be wise—a light sweater or jacket in the morning, perhaps shedding it for a tee as the sun warms your path in the afternoon. A walk along the waterfront, a quiet coffee at a quaint café, or exploring the neighborhood's hidden nooks would be splendid activities to indulge in on this serene Saturday.
